title: Google pixel 4a camera is not working. Not sure if it is a software or hardware issue
content:
The camera on the phone isn't opening at all. The screen shows black and after a long time shows the image but freezes immediately. I looked up on how to fix it and found the following  -
1. Restarted in safe mode
2. Uninstalled latest downloaded apps
3. Reset to factory settings.

None of the above has worked. My phone is 3 months old. Any help to fix the problem is appreciated.
